Former three-time NBA All-Star Gilbert Arenas has a plan on how to make the NBA game more balanced on both sides of the floor and address the lack of defensive intensity. â€œGet rid of all Europeans,â€ Arenas said during the most recent episode of his Gilâ€™s Arena show. The quote was initially met with laughs by his guests, including former NBA All-Star Kenyon Martin who almost spilled his coffee. -via EuroHoops.net / March 3, 2024
